name: Collision (Event Horizon School)
description:
Get ready, rotate, Collision! It’s the ultimate PvP sci-fi turn-based video-board-game for two players. Tactical battle has reached a new dimension! Create a connection between your Robots to gain more power, surprise your opponent and smash him at the right moment.

YOU AGAINST YOUR OPPONENT

Two Scientific laboratories, two unique Robot factions battling on a planet on the edge of destruction: only the best player will prevail! Place eight out of your sixteen Robots on the plank, choose thousand of possible combinations and connect them to increase their power: luck is not the best option here!

CLOCKWISE OR COUNTER-CLOCKWISE?

90° plank rotation will put a strain on your opponent’s tactics. This duel is going to eat you up if you are not careful enough! There are four battlefronts to keep an eye on! Rotate your plank up to 180° to set your best Robots into battle!

ENERGY IS FUNDAMENTAL!

Gather enough energy to overturn the situation at the very last moment! Gain points before your opponent does and win the game. Think before act, no time limit: one wrong move and you’ll be lost your chance. Upgrade your Robots with the ones that are left and unleash the energy to double their power. Rotate once more and win the Collision!

KEY FEATURES:

  • Two unique factions
  • Sixteen Robots to choose from, everyone with its specific abilities
  • Use tactical advantage, place your Robot wisely on the plank and get ready for the battle!
  • Rotate the planks to put your opponent in trouble
  • Use your Energy to overturn the situation
  • Electronic sound effects
  • Galactic environment
